title: ISic001669. funerary inscription for Ianuarius
body:
1cross_uninterpreted Memori - ·
2a Ianuar-
3i Eclesie

l.3 reg., orig. Eclesie

1cross_uninterpretedMEMORI-
2AIANUAR
3IECLESIE

l.3 reg., orig. Eclesie

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Ferrua 1946-47 ;
  • line.3: Manganaro 1993: Eclesi(ae servi)

English translation

Memorial of Ianuarius 'of the church'

commentary

The stone was re-used; an earlier Greek epitaph (C4/5 AD) sits on the reverse (ISic002932). Ferrua suggests that the third word should be understood as a surname, common in the early mediaeval period; Manganaro prefers to read, more literally, 'servant/slave of the church'.

bibliography

  • Ferrua 1946-1947 238 no.49 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001455
  • Manganaro 1993 587 with n.130 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001827
